object.name: jobs
object.property: The jobs that a user gets

<model xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:lingua="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/lingua" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:users="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/users" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="complete" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <default>False</default> <description/> <title>Complete</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="customer_name" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>The name of the customer</description> <required>False</required> <title>Customer Name</title> </field> <field name="customer_id" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>The id customer</description> <required>False</required> <title>Customer Id</title> </field> <field name="creation_date" type="zope.schema.Datetime"> <description>The date of creation of the system</description> <title>Creation date</title> </field> <field name="completion_date" type="zope.schema.Datetime"> <description>The date of completion</description> <required>False</required> <title>Completion Date</title> </field> <field name="additional_files" type="plone.namedfile.field.NamedBlobFile"> <description>the additional files for the file</description> <required>False</required> <title>additional files</title> </field> </schema> </model>
